mapper.select: /* com.nicepay.starter.home.HomeMapperMysql.testMysql */ SELECT A.SUBJECT, A.* FROM kmp_log_202306 A WHERE 1=1 AND DEST_PHONE='01089848094' -- AND CMID='20230602161003036180' LIMIT 10
